issue.title: www.healthline.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.healthline.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.healthline.com) ### Comment Username: @MirodePiro > Since a couple of days ads are not blocked anymore on my mac. It could be that this is from around the time I installed MAC OS Ventura. Not sure though. There is no difference between having Adguard for Safari switched on or off. I did not install any new extensions and everything is like it used to be before the problem occurred. i deleted and reinstalled adguard for safari several times but the problem keeps occurring. I also installed the other app simply named 'adguard' which also has a browser extension built in, this one also keeps showing as, here the little adguard extension icon also always is stuck on pause and i cant get it out of pause. I also installed this version of adguard several times without success. I also installed other adblockers but they all don't seem to black ads anymore, what could be the reason? ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> @PedroSaldanha
> 
> > Com o AdGuard ativado a navegação fica pesada e lenta chegando até a deixar o navegador como um todo menos responsivo. Aparentemente começa quando abro um vídeo em Miniplayer no YouTube e vou descendo a página e apontando o mouse para a pré visualização dos vídeos, uma hora a página mal carrega imagens. Com o AdGuard desativado tudo funciona normalmente.
> 
> Hi. I can't reproduce. Is this issue related to enabled filters?

Yes! I found out the problem is with AdGuard base filter. The list enabled makes a lot of sites work really slower. Twitter and Youtube for example. The youtube website crash if you keep scrolling and navigating, activating miniplayer.

issue.title: www.nbcnews.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.nbcnews.com/news/amp/rcna559](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nbcnews.com%2Fnews%2Famp%2Frcna559) ### Comment Username: @Stjernix > It worked for a while! Then for some reason I had to re-enter my product key, and ever since then it's been not working well anymore. Mostly seeing the "webpage not available" error where the ads would be, but also big blank spaces where ads would be, several "annoyances" sneak through (some are ads and some are "webpage not available" text), and ads appear (seems like many but not all, maybe like 70-80% of them) in my news feed when they didn't used to. > > Why did it stop working?? I literally didn't change anything about the program. It worked, then I noticed it wasn't working at all and that I was using 0 of 3 keys and had to enter it again, then (now) it's not working right at all. I'm very sad! ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Niestety nie potrafię tego odtworzyć.
Sprawdź proszę, czy problem występuje jeśli wyłączysz `Polish Annoyances Filters` i `Polish Anti-Annoying Special Supplement`.
Możesz też wyłączyć listę `EasyList`, bo `AdGuard Base`/`Podstawowy filtr AdGuard` zawiera już reguły z tej listy.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.healthline.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.healthline.com) ### Comment Username: @MirodePiro > Since a couple of days ads are not blocked anymore on my mac. It could be that this is from around the time I installed MAC OS Ventura. Not sure though. There is no difference between having Adguard for Safari switched on or off. I did not install any new extensions and everything is like it used to be before the problem occurred. i deleted and reinstalled adguard for safari several times but the problem keeps occurring. I also installed the other app simply named 'adguard' which also has a browser extension built in, this one also keeps showing as, here the little adguard extension icon also always is stuck on pause and i cant get it out of pause. I also installed this version of adguard several times without success. I also installed other adblockers but they all don't seem to black ads anymore, what could be the reason? ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Not reproduced this with our filters on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
If you still see ads, contact with support@adguard.com.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/134354#issue-1438961572 - Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/134354#issuecomment-1306190279 - It's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist` when `Help with the development of AdGuard filters` option is enabled in AdGuard settings. Related to this issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/1486
Please disable this option or mentioned filter list.

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/134354#issuecomment-1306471566 - Please enable `AdGuard Base filter` instead of `EasyList` and update filters.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your settings. I see this ad when AdGuard is paused.
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

comment.body:
Реклама не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
Not reproduced this with our filters on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

AdGuard for Android

3.6.10

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

pull_request.title: Maintenance related to KO website 7
pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/85017
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/18799
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/48902
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/84644
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/85309
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/84647
 - https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/11117/
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/84316
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/81162
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/80447

### Add your comment and screenshots

This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/371

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
